text: "Always On My Mind " is the debut single by Australian singer and songwriter Rani. Released in June 1997 as the lead single from her debut studio album, The Infinite Blue (1998), the song peaked at number 33 on the ARIA Charts in August 1997. At the ARIA Music Awards of 1997, the song was nominated for two awards: Best Pop Release and Best New Talent. ==Track listing== ==Charts== {|class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (1997) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |} ==References== Category:1997 debut singles Category:1997 songs Category:Songs written by Paul Gray (songwriter)
title: Always on My Mind (Rani song)
